All Classes

Class Description
AuthorizationFilter
This class is the original implementation of the authentication filter class which runs before any of the requests made to an end-point of this service/project.
Consumer
This class represents consumers and is a type of users.
DBHandler
This class acts as a Super class for all classes where database access is needed.
DBOpStatus
This ENUM class defines all the valid types of a response in case a database operation or an end-point call is not replying with a collection of data or when a status message is required.
Employee
This class represents employees and is a type of users.
Funder
This class represents funders and is a type of users.
InterServiceCommHandler
This class is used when classes in USER SERVICE needs to establish service-to-service communication with other web services of the GADGETBADGET system.
JsonResponseBuilder
JsonResponseBuilder class is responsible for generate status messages as a JSON object.
JWK
The class JWK is distributed among all the services as a part of the authentication process implemented by the USER SERVICE.
JWTHandler
This class handles all the JWT related operations including JWT generation, JWT validation, JWT PAYLOAD decoding Generating new RSA Key Pairs, etc.
PaymentMethod
This class represents payment methods of all users except for employees.
Researcher
This class represents researchers and is a type of users.
Role
This class represents roles of users and contains user role related methods and database operations that are common to all users.
RoleSecurityContext
This class is used to Inject new user data which were obtained from the JWT PAYLOAD to the security context and the user/service principal of the request after authentication process is succeeded.
SecurityResource  
ServiceType
This ENUM class contains the types of services that belongs to the GADGETBADGET web application.
User
This class represents users as a whole and contains user account related methods and database operations that are common to all users.
UserPrincipal
This class is used to Inject new user principal to the security context of the request after authentication process is succeeded.
UserResource  
UserType
This ENUM class contains the types of users/stake-holders that directly interacts with the GADGETBADGET web application.
ValidationHandler
This class is mainly used to do verifications need to be performed in various classes.
